thread.title: Salman Khan wishes to watch Priyanka’s ‘Quantico’
thread.title_full: Salman Khan wishes to watch Priyanka’s ‘Quantico’ | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Salman Khan wishes to watch Priyanka’s ‘Quantico’
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter Superstar Salman Khan is waiting for actress Priyanka Chopra ’s much-talked about debut American TV series “Quantico” to air in India.
The mystery-thriller premiered in the US on September 28 and got rave reviews for the 33-year-old actress.
Not knowing the show’s Indian premiere date, Salman, 49, took to Twitter to ask his fans, “When is PC’s show releasing in India guys?”
Priyanka is fondly called PC in Bollywood but to avoid any confusion, the “Bajrangi Bhaijaan” star further tweeted “Sorry pc se mera matlab was Priyanka Chopra (By PC I meant Priyanka Chopra).”
“Quantico”, featuring Priyanka in the lead role of Alex Parrish, will premiere in India on October 3.
Salman and the “Mary Kom” actress have starred together in films like “God Tussi Great Ho”, “Mujse Shaadi Karogi” and “Salaam-e-Ishq: A Tribute to Love”.
Actress Madhuri Dixit-Nene also shared her excitement for the show, on Twitter.
“Congratulations @priyankachopra wish you great success on #Quantico, waiting to watch it!” she tweeted.
First Published on October 02, 2015 8:59 am
